item.title: EP 299 - Are Black People Being Murdered For Their Organs?
item.itunes:title: Are Black People Being Murdered For Their Organs?
item.description:
A Germany fairy tale with a bizarre twist, and then we explore the conspiracy that black people are being killed for their organs!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

‘ORGAN HARVESTING’…ARE BLACK PEOPLE BEING KILLED FOR THEIR ORGANS? DICK GREGORY THOUGHT SO! (WATCH)

https://www.eurthisnthat.com/2017/09/26/organ-harvesting-are-black-people-being-killed-for-their-organs-dick-gregory-thought-so-watch/

 

The reality of "ORGANS HARVESTING"

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-jq95ltgzp8

 

French 'kidnappers' sent home from Chad

https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/1573880/French-kidnappers-sent-home-from-Chad.html

 

Organs Taken from African Refugees - While They are Still Alive!

https://www.catholic.org/news/international/middle_east/story.php?id=43531

 

Chad Charges French Charity With Kidnapping

https://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=15766645?storyId=15766645

 

2007 Zoé's Ark controversy

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007_Zo%C3%A9%27s_Ark_controversy

 

Zoe's Ark: Charity or child trafficking?

https://www.aljazeera.com/programmes/insidestory/2013/02/20132149627862525.html

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
